response.overview: In this project UTAH & ETHER (dubbed the "Bonnie & Clyde" of the graffiti world by The New York Times) will take you into the depths of Asia, a place mostly untouched by graffiti, where the couple spent years documenting their travels and painting the metro systems in some of the wildest cities on the world's largest continent. Props to Utah, Ether, the other writers in this series and the man who helped it happen Boris of The Grifters Journal.
response.tagline: Freedom is Not Defined By Safety
response.title: Utah & Ether: Probation Vacation
